last_episode_to_air.name: It's finer than usual today
last_episode_to_air.overview: Levius has just one spin hook left; AJ's second steam engine is just below her heart. It may not be possible to both win the fight and save her life.

name: Levius
overview: With the casualties of war still haunting him, young Levius uses his prosthetic arm to take his fight into the brutal world of Mecha Boxing.

episodes.name: All of the impact ends up here
episodes.overview: Against his trainer's wishes, Levius uses his spin hook on his opponent. Despite the risk of mechanical failure, he wants to keep using it.

episodes.name: Does it seem like the boy is getting on okay?
episodes.overview: Levius's uncle Zack takes him in after his mother is injured during the war. They struggle to connect until Levius shows an interest in boxing.

episodes.name: How in the world does that thing pass as an elbow guard?
episodes.overview: Malcolm Eden's last five bouts have all ended in his opponent's death. Zack pleads with Levius to forfeit the upcoming fight, but Levius refuses.

episodes.name: He… He's the real thing…
episodes.overview: Levius is somehow unable to dodge Eden's punches. Natalia and Zack figure out what's going on just in time for the maintenance break.

episodes.name: Do I look like an idiot who thinks about losing before a fight?
episodes.overview: The hulking Hugo Stratus is Levius's opponent in his promotion bout. While Natalia is upset at being passed over, Bill is suspicious.

episodes.name: She called out for my help
episodes.overview: Levius recognizes the mark on AJ's armor, and remembers where he's seen it before. Hugo's father urges him to forfeit the match, but he's too proud.

episodes.name: Do you remember? We met before
episodes.overview: The group visits Clown's residence. When Levius asks AJ if she recalls their first meeting, she insists he's misremembering the events in Greenbridge.

episodes.name: These young geniuses… It's enough to make you sick…
episodes.overview: Team Levius prepares for the next fight: Bill fabricates a new arm, while Zack and Natalia help Levius train. Malcolm Eden volunteers to assist.

episodes.name: Can you make the deadline?
episodes.overview: Levius's new arm fails the first inspection. When Bill's frantic fixes don't solve the issue, Levius proposes a radical and life-threatening solution.

episodes.name: It's me who's to give you that thrashing!
episodes.overview: The fight with AJ begins, with both their futures on the line. AJ's inhuman movement and inability to feel pain make her a formidable foe.

episodes.name: The possiblility of it working is infinitely close to zero!
episodes.overview: The stratagem fails, and AJ returns to the ring. Team Levius realizes she's cheating, but only Zack's desperate choice can stop her in time.

episodes.name: It's finer than usual today
episodes.overview: Levius has just one spin hook left; AJ's second steam engine is just below her heart. It may not be possible to both win the fight and save her life.
